attributes.action: Stop vaccines being made mandatory for children to attend school!
attributes.additional_details:
Infomation to be considered includes - 
Vaccine inserts 
Vaxxed documentary 
The truth about vaccines documentary series 
Susan humphries work
Dr Andrew Wakefield’s work
attributes.background:
The safety of vaccines has long been called into question by discerning parents who would like all vaccines to be double blind placebo tested, as to date this safety check is yet to be carried out. 
The presence of a host of harmful substances are found in vaccines, including mercury and alluminum.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 
	
There is no requirement for children to be vaccinated for them to attend schools.
